{"id":473448159,"lang":"cpp","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1616938506,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/473448159/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Unsorted Continuous Subarray","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findUnsortedSubarray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int left=0;\n        int right=nums.size()-1;\n        while(left<=right && nums[left+1]>=nums[left])\n        {\n            left++;\n        }\n        while(right>0 && nums[right-1]<=nums[right])\n        {\n            right--;\n        }\n        int sbmax=0;\n        int sbmin=nums[right];\n        for(int i=left;i<=right;i++)\n        {\n            sbmin=min(sbmin,nums[i]);\n            sbmax=max(sbmax,nums[i]);\n        }        \n        while(left>=0)\n        {\n            if(sbmin<nums[left])\n                left--;\n            else\n                break;\n        }\n        while(right<nums.size())\n        {\n            if(sbmax>nums[right])\n                right++;\n            else\n                break;\n        }       \n        return right-left-1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-unsorted-continuous-subarray"}
